title: I Have a Sickness - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Acting   Arrogant Characters   Bullying   Business Management   Businessmen   Carefree Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Power Couple   Pragmatic Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Revenge   Ruthless Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Selfish Protagonist   Shameless Protagonist   Sickly Characters   System Administrator   Transmigration   Wealthy Characters   World Hopping
author: 呼啦圈
description:
System, “You have a sickness. Moreover, you’ll have one in every world.”

Hao Ritian, “…”

System, “What’s wrong? Is there a problem?”

Hao Ritian smiled. “No, there’s no problem. I was just a bit excited.”

System, “…”

That smile intensified the system’s feeling of ominous foreboding. It has had this premonition since it learned the name of its host. Now it only prays that this is all its imagination!>
